title: Spawning External Processes in Go
description: In some cases, Go programs need to spawn non-Go processes. This lab aims to demonstrate how to spawn external processes in Go.

meta.title: Spawning External Processes in Go
meta.description: Learn how to spawn non-Go processes and collect their output in your Go programs.
meta.keywords: spawning, go, golang, process management, go labs, go playground online, external processes, go lab, go practice

verify.name: Verify Spawned Process Output Matches Command-Line
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.
